text: Anthony "Tony" Dow is a British television director best known for his work on Only Fools and Horses. He has won two BAFTAs and been nominated four times. ==Filmography== *Only Fools and Horses (1988–2003, 2014) *Hunderby (2012–2015) *Big School (2013) *Stella (2012–2016) ==Awards== Dow has won two BAFTAs, both for Only Fools and Horses. He has been nominated four times. == References == ==External links== * Category:British television directors Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Tony Dow (director)
